title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'. When performing a 'copy package' operation, the package 'ui' is incorrectly created in the destination. This behavior occurs in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui component of jdt.ui.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation from the context menu, the destination project contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: After performing the 'copy package' operation from the context menu, the destination project should not contain a package named 'ui'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project. 2. Open the Package Viewer. 3. Select a package in the project (e.g., from the context menu). 4. Choose the 'copy' option from the context menu.
